name: docs-ia
description: Documentation information architecture + scope cleanup: make docs navigable, mark freshness, archive outdated materials, and define what is canonical.

userStories.title: Oracle-assisted docs audit + IA proposal
userStories.description: As a contributor, I want a single proposal for docs IA, canonical reading paths, and archiving rules so it’s obvious what to read and what to ignore.
acceptanceCriteria: Produce a written IA proposal (folders, naming, indices)
Provide reading paths for core workflows (marketplace, PoH, OpenClaw integration)
userStories.notes: IA proposal written (docs/roadmaps/docs-ia/IA_PROPOSAL.md), 222 docs classified into canonical/active/draft/archive.

userStories.title: Archive or mark outdated docs
userStories.description: As a reader, I want outdated docs clearly marked or moved into an archive so I don’t mistake them for current state.
acceptanceCriteria: Outdated docs are moved to an archive folder or get an explicit status banner
Indexes link only to canonical/current docs by default
No broken internal links after moves
userStories.notes: Root-level redirect stubs already in place. No broken links. Archive folder active. Protocol-M planning bundle archived.

userStories.title: Docs status/freshness convention
userStories.description: As a contributor, I want a lightweight status/freshness template so important docs signal whether they are current, draft, or archived.
acceptanceCriteria: Define a standard header block for key docs (Status, Owner, Last updated, Canonical links)
Apply it to the docs hub + a few key specs/roadmaps
userStories.notes: Status blocks applied to all canonical hubs, specs, foundations, roadmap READMEs, and adoption guide. Template at docs/_templates/STATUS_BLOCK.md.

userStories.title: Add a "What to read" index per audience
userStories.description: As a new engineer, I want a 5-minute reading list tailored to what I’m doing so I can start without guessing.
acceptanceCriteria: Add a concise list for: marketplace dev, PoH dev, OpenClaw integration dev, ecosystem/strategy
Lists are kept up to date as part of roadmap updates
userStories.notes: WHAT_TO_READ.md expanded with 3 new paths: protocol adopter, economy/risk developer, enterprise buyer.
